properties.name: --mdc-icon-font
properties.description: Font to use for the icons. Default: Material Icons

properties.name: --mdc-icon-size
properties.description: Sets the size of the icon. Default: `24px`

properties.name: --mdc-theme-primary
properties.description: The theme primary color. Default: `#6200ee`

properties.name: --mdc-theme-secondary
properties.description: The theme secondary color. Default: `#018786`

properties.name: --mdc-theme-background
properties.description: The theme background color.

properties.name: --mdc-theme-surface
properties.description: The theme surface color. Default: `#fff`

properties.name: --mdc-theme-on-primary
properties.description: Text color on top of a primary background. Default: `#ffffff`

properties.name: --mdc-theme-on-secondary
properties.description: Text color on top of a secondary background. Default: `#ffffff`

properties.name: --mdc-theme-on-surface
properties.description: Text color on top of a surface background. Default: `#000`

properties.name: --mdc-theme-text-primary-on-light
properties.description: Text color for primary on top of light background.

properties.name: --mdc-theme-text-secondary-on-light
properties.description: Text color for secondary on top of light background.

properties.name: --mdc-theme-text-hint-on-light
properties.description: Text color for hint on top of light background.

properties.name: --mdc-theme-text-disabled-on-light
properties.description: Text color for disabled on top of light background. Default: `rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.38)`

properties.name: --mdc-theme-text-icon-on-light
properties.description: Text color for icon on top of light background.

properties.name: --mdc-theme-text-primary-on-dark
properties.description: Text color for primary on top of dark background.

properties.name: --mdc-theme-text-secondary-on-dark
properties.description: Text color for secondary on top of dark background.

properties.name: --mdc-theme-text-hint-on-dark
properties.description: Text color for hint on top of dark background.

properties.name: --mdc-theme-text-disabled-on-dark
properties.description: Text color for disabled on top of dark background.

properties.name: --mdc-theme-text-icon-on-dark
properties.description: Text color for icon on top of dark background.

properties.name: --mdc-button-horizontal-padding
properties.description: Left and right padding of the button label (for outlined buttons the outline width is automatically subtracted). Default: filled: `16px` outlined: `15px` default: `8px`

properties.name: --mdc-button-outline-width
properties.description: `width` of the outline of an outlined button and attempts to keep the component size constant. Default: `1px`

properties.name: --mdc-button-outline-color
properties.description: Color of the outline of an outlined element. (Overrides `--mdc-theme-primary`) Default: `--mdc-theme-primary`

properties.name: --mdc-button-disabled-fill-color
properties.description: Background fill color of a disabled raised or unelevated button. Default: `rgba(0,0,0,0.12)`

properties.name: --mdc-button-disabled-ink-color
properties.description: Text color of a disabled button as well as the outline color of a disabled outlined button. Default: `rgba(0,0,0,0.37)`

properties.name: --mdc-button-disabled-outline-color
properties.description: Sets the color of the outline of a disabled outlined button. (Overrides `--mdc-button-disabled-ink-color`) Default: `--mdc-button-disabled-ink-color`

properties.name: --mdc-button-raised-box-shadow
properties.description: Sets the box shadow of the raised button. Default: mdc elevation 2

properties.name: --mdc-button-raised-box-shadow-hover
properties.description: Sets the box shadow of the raised button when focused or hovered. Default: mdc elevation 4

properties.name: --mdc-button-raised-box-shadow-active
properties.description: Sets the box shadow of the raised button when active. Default: mdc elevation 8

properties.name: --mdc-button-raised-box-shadow-disabled
properties.description: Sets the box shadow of the raised button when disabled. Default: mdc elevation 0

properties.name: --mdc-checkbox-mark-color
properties.description: Color of mark inside a `checked` or `indeterminate` checkbox (enabled or disabled). Default: `#fff`

properties.name: --mdc-checkbox-unchecked-color
properties.description: Color of the unchecked box. Default: `rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.54)`

properties.name: --mdc-checkbox-disabled-color
properties.description: Color of the checkbox box and fill when disabled. Default: `rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.38)`

properties.name: --mdc-dialog-scrim-color
properties.description: Color of the scrim. (**Note:** setting alpha to 0 will still make scrim clickable but transparent). Default: `rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.32)`

properties.name: --mdc-dialog-heading-ink-color
properties.description: Color of the heading text. Default: `rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.87)`

properties.name: --mdc-dialog-content-ink-color
properties.description: Color applied to the projected content. (**Note:** it may also be possible to style the content via the light DOM since it is not encapsulated in a shadow root). Default: `rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6)`

properties.name: --mdc-dialog-scroll-divider-color
properties.description: Color of the dividers present when dialog is scrollable. Default: `rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.12)`

properties.name: --mdc-dialog-min-width
properties.description: min-width ofthe dialog surface. Default: `280px`

properties.name: --mdc-dialog-max-width
properties.description: max-width of the dialog surface. (**Note:** if max-width is < `560px`, there is a visual jank bug that will occur causing the max width to be `560px` when the window is sized to <= than `560px`). Default: `560px`

properties.name: --mdc-dialog-max-height
properties.description: Max height of the dialog surface. Default: `calc(100% - 32px)`

properties.name: --mdc-dialog-shape-radius
properties.description: Corner radius of the dialog surface. Default: `4px`

properties.name: --mdc-dialog-box-shadow
properties.description: Sets the box shadow of the dialog. Default: mdc elevation 24

properties.name: --mdc-fab-box-shadow
properties.description: Sets the box shadow of the fab. Default: mdc elevation 6

properties.name: --mdc-fab-box-shadow-hover
properties.description: Sets the box shadow of the fab when focused or hovered. Default: mdc elevation 8

properties.name: --mdc-fab-box-shadow-active
properties.description: Sets the box shadow of the fab when active. Default: mdc elevation 12

properties.name: --mdc-icon-button-ripple-opacity
properties.description: Opacity of the ripple on the icon button Default: `0.12`

properties.name: --mdc-icon-button-size
properties.description: Sets the size of the button wrapping the icon. Default: `48px`

properties.name: --mdc-linear-progress-buffer-color
properties.description:
Sets the color of the buffer progress bar.
**NOTE:** to change the color of the buffering dots, you must do so in the image of `--mdc-linear-progress-buffering-dots-image`. Default: `#E6E6E6`

properties.name: --mdc-linear-progress-buffering-dots-image
properties.description: Sets the image to use as the buffering dots. This pattern is then repeated horizontally and animated. Default: `url(data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg version='1.1' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' xmlns:xlink='http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink' x='0px' y='0px' enable-background='new 0 0 5 2' xml:space='preserve' viewBox='0 0 5 2' preserveAspectRatio='none slice'%3E%3Ccircle cx='1' cy='1' r='1' fill='%23e6e6e6'/%3E%3C/svg%3E)`

properties.name: --mdc-theme-text-primary-on-background
properties.description: Color of the primary text. Default: `rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.87)`

properties.name: --mdc-list-vertical-padding
properties.description: Padding before and after the first and last list items. Default: `8px`

properties.name: --mdc-list-side-padding
properties.description: Adjusts the padding of the `[padded]` list dividers (also propagates to `mwc-list-item`). Default: `16px`

properties.name: --mdc-list-inset-margin
properties.description: Adjusts the left inset padding of an `[inset]` list divider. Typically used for dividing list items with icons. Default: `72px`

properties.name: --mdc-theme-primary
properties.description: Color of the activated ripple and primary text color when activated. Default: `#6200ee`

properties.name: --mdc-theme-on-surface
properties.description: Disabled text color Default: `#000`

properties.name: --mdc-theme-text-icon-on-background
properties.description: Color of the graphic icon (if graphic is text icon). Default: `rgba(0, 0, 0, .38)`

properties.name: --mdc-theme-text-primary-on-background
properties.description: Color of the primary text if not activated. Default: `rgba(0, 0, 0, .87)`

properties.name: --mdc-theme-text-secondary-on-background
properties.description: Color of the secondary text if not activated. Default: `rgba(0, 0, 0, .54)`

properties.name: --mdc-theme-hint-on-background
properties.description: Color of the meta (if is text or text icon). Default: `rgba(0, 0, 0, .38)`

properties.name: --mdc-list-side-padding
properties.description: Side padding of the list item. Default: `16px`

properties.name: --mdc-list-item-meta-size
properties.description: Line height of the meta icon or text and width & height of the slotted parent wrapper. Default: `24px`

properties.name: --mdc-list-item-graphic-size
properties.description: Line height of the graphic and width & height of the slotted parent wrapper. `24px` when graphic is `'icon'`. `40px` when graphic is `'avatar'`. `56px` when graphic is `'medium'`, and `'large'`. Default: `24px`,`40px`,`56px`

properties.name: --mdc-list-item-graphic-margin
properties.description: Margin between the text and graphic. `16px` when graphic is `'avatar'`, `'medium'`, `'large'`, and `'control'`. `32px` when graphic is `'icon'`. Default: `16px`, `32px`

properties.name: --mdc-shape-medium
properties.description: Border radius of the dropdown. Default: `4px`

properties.name: --mdc-menu-item-height
properties.description: Height of single-line list-items in the menu. Default: `48px`

properties.name: --mdc-menu-min-width
properties.description: Menu min-width. Default: `auto`

properties.name: --mdc-menu-max-width
properties.description: Menu max-width. Default: `auto`

properties.name: --mdc-menu-z-index
properties.description: Z-index of the popup menu surface. Default: `8`

properties.name: --mdc-notched-outline-leading-width
properties.description: Width of the leading section of the outline (left of notch in LTR). Default: `12px`

properties.name: --mdc-notched-outline-leading-border-radius
properties.description: Radius of the border on the leading end. **May require setting `--mdc-notched-outline-leading-width` to accommodate for the new radius** Default: `4px 0 0 4px`

properties.name: --mdc-notched-outline-trailing-border-radius
properties.description: Radius of the border on the trailing end. Default: `0 4px 4px 0`

properties.name: --mdc-notched-outline-stroke-width
properties.description: Outline width. Default: `1px`

properties.name: --mdc-notched-outline-notch-offset
properties.description: Padding-top to apply to notch when open to compensate for border width box size Default: `0`

properties.name: --mdc-notched-outline-border-color
properties.description: Sets the border / outline color. Default: none

properties.name: --mdc-radio-unchecked-color
properties.description: Color of the ring of an unchecked radio. Default: `rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.54)`

properties.name: --mdc-radio-disabled-color
properties.description: Color of the ring and circle of a disabled radio. Default: `rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.38)`

properties.name: --mdc-ripple-color
properties.description: Color of the ripple will have when activated. Default: `#000`

properties.name: --mdc-ripple-press-opacity
properties.description: Opacity of the ripple when pressed. Default: `0.12`

properties.name: --mdc-ripple-hover-opacity
properties.description: Opacity of the ripple when hovered. Default: `0.04`

properties.name: --mdc-ripple-focus-opacity
properties.description: Opacity of the ripple when focused. Default: `0.12`

properties.name: --mdc-ripple-selected-opacity
properties.description: Opacity of the ripple when the host component is 'selected'. This opacity is added to `press`, `hover`, and `focus` states. Default: `0.08`

properties.name: --mdc-ripple-activated-opacity
properties.description: Opacity of the ripple when the host component is 'activated'. This opacity is added to `press`, `hover`, and `focus` states. Default: `0.12`

properties.name: --mdc-theme-error
properties.description: Color when errored of the underline ripple, the outline, the caret, the dropdown-icon, and the focused and activatd list items. Default: `#b00020`

properties.name: --mdc-select-error-color
properties.description: Applies where --mdc-theme-error applies. Default: `--mdc-theme-error`

properties.name: --mdc-select-idle-line-color
properties.description: Color of the filled select's bottom line when idle. Default: `rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.42)`

properties.name: --mdc-select-hover-line-color
properties.description: Color of the filled select's bottom line when hovering. Default: `rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.87)`

properties.name: --mdc-select-outlined-idle-border-color
properties.description: Color of the outlined select's outline when idle. Default: `rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.38)`

properties.name: --mdc-select-outlined-hover-border-color
properties.description: Color of the outlined select's outline when hovering. Default: `rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.87)`

properties.name: --mdc-select-outlined-disabled-border-color
properties.description: Color of the outlined select's outline when disabled. Default: `rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.16)`

properties.name: --mdc-select-fill-color
properties.description: Color of the select's background fill (non-outlined). Default: `rgb(245, 245, 245)`

properties.name: --mdc-select-disabled-fill-color
properties.description: Color of the select's background fill (non-outlined) when disabled. Default: `rgb(250, 250, 250)`

properties.name: --mdc-select-ink-color
properties.description: Color of the selected text in default and error states. Default: `rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.87)`

properties.name: --mdc-select-label-ink-color
properties.description: Color of the non-focused floating label, helper text, and placeholder. `rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6)`

properties.name: --mdc-select-focused-label-color
properties.description: Color of the focused floating label, helper text, and placeholder. Default: `--mdc-theme-primary`

properties.name: --mdc-select-disabled-ink-color
properties.description: Color of the input text, the floating label, helper text, and placeholder of a disabled select. Default: `rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.37)`

properties.name: --mdc-select-dropdown-icon-color
properties.description: Color of the dropdown icon when select is not activated. Default: `rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.54)`

properties.name: --mdc-select-focused-dropdown-icon-color
properties.description: Color of the dropdown icon when select is activated. Default: `--mdc-theme-primary`

properties.name: --mdc-select-disabled-dropdown-icon-color
properties.description: Opacity of the dropdown icon when disabled. Default: `rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.38)`

properties.name: --mdc-select-error-dropdown-icon-color
properties.description: Color of the dropdown icon when select is invalid. Default: `--mdc-select-error-color`

properties.name: --mdc-slider-bg-color-behind-component
properties.description: Sets the color of the circle around the knob on the disabled slider to make it seem cut-out. May be necessary when placing a disabled slider on a different-colored background. Default: `white`

properties.name: --mdc-snackbar-action-color
properties.description: Color of the action button text. `#bb86fc`

properties.name: --mdc-tab-height
properties.description: Height of the tab. Default: `48px`

properties.name: --mdc-tab-horizontal-padding
properties.description: Horizontal padding on either side of the tab. Default: `24px`

properties.name: --mdc-tab-stacked-height
properties.description: Height of the tab's stacked variant. Default: `72px`

properties.name: --mdc-tab-border-radius
properties.description: Tab's border radius (does not clip indicator). Default: `0px`

properties.name: --mdc-tab-text-label-color-default
properties.description: Color of an unactivated tab label. Default: `rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6)`

properties.name: --mdc-tab-color-default
properties.description: Color of an unactivated icon. Default: `rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.54)`

properties.name: --mdc-text-area-filled-border-radius
properties.description: Border radius of the standard / filled textarea's background filling. Default: `4px 4px 0 0`

properties.name: --mdc-text-area-outlined-idle-border-color
properties.description: Color of the outlined textarea's  outline when idle. Default: `rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.38)`

properties.name: --mdc-text-area-outlined-hover-border-color
properties.description: Color of the outlined textarea's outline when hovering. Default: `rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.87)`

properties.name: --mdc-text-area-outlined-disabled-border-color
properties.description: Color of the outlined textarea's outline when disabled. Default: `rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.06)`

properties.name: --mdc-text-field-filled-border-radius
properties.description: Border radius of the standard / filled textfield's background filling. Default: `4px 4px 0 0`

properties.name: --mdc-text-field-idle-line-color
properties.description: Color of the filled textfield's bottom line when idle. Default: `rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.42)`

properties.name: --mdc-text-field-hover-line-color
properties.description: Color of the filled textfield's bottom line when hovering. Default: `rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.87)`

properties.name: --mdc-text-field-disabled-line-color
properties.description: Color of the filled textfield's bottom line when disabled. Default: `rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.06)`

properties.name: --mdc-text-field-outlined-idle-border-color
properties.description: Color of the outlined textfield's  outline when idle. Default: `rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.38)`

properties.name: --mdc-text-field-outlined-hover-border-color
properties.description: Color of the outlined textfield's outline when hovering. Default: `rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.87)`

properties.name: --mdc-text-field-outlined-disabled-border-color
properties.description: Color of the outlined textfield's outline when disabled. Default: `rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.06)`

properties.name: --mdc-text-field-fill-color
properties.description: Color of the textfield's background fill (non-outlined). Default: `rgb(245, 245, 245)`

properties.name: --mdc-text-field-disabled-fill-color
properties.description: Color of the textfield's background fill (non-outlined) when disabled. Default: `rgb(250, 250, 250)`

properties.name: --mdc-text-field-ink-color
properties.description: Color of the input text. Default: `rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.87)`

properties.name: --mdc-text-field-label-ink-color
properties.description: Color of the non-focused floating label, helper text, char counter, and placeholder. Default: `rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6)`

properties.name: --mdc-text-field-disabled-ink-color
properties.description: Color of the input text, the floating label, helper text, char counter, and placeholder of a disabled textfield. Default: `rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.37)`

properties.name: --mdc-top-app-bar-fixed-box-shadow
properties.description: Sets the box shadow of the fixed top app bar when scrolling. Default: mdc elevation 4
